author: sonialausp
title: It was my 5th stay at the hotel, that is very good in its cathegory.
text:
The roon is small but confortable. The bathroon is clean an well maintained.
The location is very good, two blocks from the Sena river, near a very good shopping center, super market, good restaurants, metro and the Eiffel Tours is also very close.
